name: Volden Idle
description:
Volden Idle is a idle/clicking game inspired by Melvor Idle and Runescape.
The main objective of the game is to level up the all the different skills to level 99. If you are up for a grind, this is the game for you.

Volden Idle combines elements from various idle games without the hassle of ascension or restarting. Level up to 99 using a blend of clicking, idling, and interactive mini-game type leveling. Encounter a variety of mobs and foes as you tackle combat training, or focus on leveling the more friendly skills like farming or woodcutting.
